content: this crochet pattern is for a lavender sachet materials light-weight #3 cotton yarn crochet cotton thread #10 finished size about 4 5 x 4 11 5 x 10 cm skill level intermediate language english the pattern uses crochet us terms free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-lavender-sachet-bag/ product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external websites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
